price: 11. Мре tika ngai na baye bazuaka manso na lokuta baye bazali kosepela na bisengo na bango, bazali sé na tango moke ya kozela.
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
